metadata.title: CVE-2021-47130 on Ubuntu 24.04 LTS (noble) - medium
metadata.description:
In the Linux kernel, the following vulnerability has been resolved: nvmet:fix freeing unallocated p2pmem In case p2p device was found but the p2ppool is empty, the nvme target is still trying to free the sgl from the p2ppool instead of the regular sgl pool and causing a crash (BUG() is called).Instead, assign the p2p_dev for the request only if it was allocated fromp2p pool. This is the crash that was caused: [Sun May 30 19:13:53 2021]------------[ cut here ]------------ [Sun May 30 19:13:53 2021] kernel BUGat lib/genalloc.c:518! [Sun May 30 19:13:53 2021] invalid opcode: 0000 [#1]SMP PTI ... [Sun May 30 19:13:53 2021] kernel BUG at lib/genalloc.c:518!... [Sun May 30 19:13:53 2021] RIP: 0010:gen_pool_free_owner+0xa8/0xb0 ...[Sun May 30 19:13:53 2021] Call Trace: [Sun May 30 19:13:53 2021]------------[ cut here ]------------ [Sun May 30 19:13:53 2021]pci_free_p2pmem+0x2b/0x70 [Sun May 30 19:13:53 2021]pci_p2pmem_free_sgl+0x4f/0x80 [Sun May 30 19:13:53 2021]nvmet_req_free_sgls+0x1e/0x80 [nvmet] [Sun May 30 19:13:53 2021] kernel BUGat lib/genalloc.c:518! [Sun May 30 19:13:53 2021]nvmet_rdma_release_rsp+0x4e/0x1f0 [nvmet_rdma] [Sun May 30 19:13:53 2021]nvmet_rdma_send_done+0x1c/0x60 [nvmet_rdma]

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2021-47130` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

linux-image-6.5.0-9-generic - 6.5.0-9.9
linux-image-unsigned-6.5.0-9-generic - 6.5.0-9.9
linux-image-unsigned-6.5.0-9-generic-64k - 6.5.0-9.9
No subscription required

linux-image-unsigned-6.5.0-1008-aws - 6.5.0-1008.8
No subscription required

linux-image-unsigned-6.5.0-1007-azure - 6.5.0-1007.7
No subscription required

linux-image-unsigned-6.5.0-1007-gcp - 6.5.0-1007.7
No subscription required

linux-image-unsigned-6.8.0-1003-gke - 6.8.0-1003.5
No subscription required

linux-image-unsigned-6.5.0-1009-ibm - 6.5.0-1009.9
No subscription required

linux-image-unsigned-6.5.0-9-lowlatency - 6.5.0-9.9.1
linux-image-unsigned-6.5.0-9-lowlatency-64k - 6.5.0-9.9.1
No subscription required

linux-image-unsigned-6.5.0-1010-oracle - 6.5.0-1010.10
No subscription required

linux-image-6.5.0-1005-raspi - 6.5.0-1005.7
No subscription required

linux-image-unsigned-6.8.0-1003-oem - 6.8.0-1003.3
No subscription required

linux-image-unsigned-6.8.0-1005-intel - 6.8.0-1001.6
No subscription required
